EXPERIENCED.ExperiencedDescription_Label: Our engineers and specialists combine deep technical knowledge with years of practical, hands-on experience across diverse and demanding projects. In the face of ever-evolving challenges, they don’t just follow conventional paths—they craft creative, forward-thinking solutions that reflect a spirit of innovation and excellence. What truly sets us apart is this unique perspective: a commitment to precision, responsibility, and a vision that sees beyond the surface. We believe construction is more than building walls and roofs; it’s about shaping environments that tell a story, support human connection, and stand as lasting symbols of progress. We don’t just build structures—we create frames for life, spaces where people grow, dream, and thrive toward a brighter future. Each project we take on is a reflection of our values, dedication, and attention to detail. With every structure we raise, we aim to leave a meaningful, lasting impact on both the landscape and the lives within it.

SERVICES.ServiceItem5_Label: Modern Services (Smart Building Systems, Industrialized Construction)
SERVICES.ServicesDescription_Label: Amiran Construction Company is proud to offer a comprehensive suite of construction services to the esteemed citizens and investors of the holy city of Qom, built on a foundation of expertise, commitment, and innovation. With a deep understanding of today's needs and a clear vision for the future, we strive to be more than just a builder; we aim to be your trusted partner in every project. Our services are designed to cover every phase of a construction project, from the initial spark of an idea to the final handover and beyond, ensuring a transparent, optimized, and valuable experience for you. Our approach at Amiran combines engineering principles, modern management, and cutting-edge technologies. We view each project as a unique opportunity to create sustainable, beautiful, and functional spaces that enhance the quality of life for residents and contribute to the urban fabric. Our integrated services include: Through professional Project Management (مدیریت پیمان), we act as your faithful representative, taking full responsibility for planning, cost control, quality assurance, and timely execution to protect your investment and time with complete transparency. In our Joint Venture in Construction (مشارکت در ساخت) model, we merge our expertise and capital with your property, creating a win-win partnership to generate added value and turn the dream of a modern building into reality. In the field of Renovation and Regeneration (نوسازی و باز آفرینی), we breathe new life into aged and worn-out spaces. While preserving the building's original identity and character, we upgrade its functionality and aesthetics to meet contemporary standards. The core of our services is Comprehensive Building Design (طراحی جامع ساختمان), where we leverage creative architecture, inviting interior design, and the advanced technology of BIM (Building Information Modeling). This allows us to create an integrated, precise, and error-free plan that prevents resource waste and gives you a clear vision of the project's future. With an eye on the future, Amiran offers Modern Services (خدمات نوین), including Smart Building systems (هوشمندسازی) to enhance comfort, security, and energy efficiency, and Industrialized Construction (صنعتی‌سازی) to increase the speed, quality, and durability of structures. Finally, through our Pre-selling (Off-plan) opportunities (پیش فروش), we provide a secure and profitable path for your investment and homeownership goals, committing to uphold our promises and earn your trust. We invite you to entrust your projects to Amiran Construction Company and experience a new standard of construction in Qom.

TEAM.TeamItem1Description_Label: With a degree in Civil Engineering and Executive Management, and holding a Grade 1 license from the Engineering Organization, he is a certified qualified contractor with expertise in managing large-scale construction projects.

WHY_AMIRAN.WhyAmiranDescriptionTitle_Label: The difference lies in our perspective
WHY_AMIRAN.WhyAmiranDescription_Label: Our energy and commitment to executing projects with precision and creativity, transparency as clear as glass in financial processes, and ultimately, sustainable development and respect for our surrounding environment, the beauty of our cities, and the elevated status of our beloved Iran—this is our perspective. Details have always mattered to us, so we can capture smiles within the lifeless structure of steel and concrete. Amiran goes beyond construction—it is a commitment to creating a unique experience for our clients, with a focus on quality, timing, and professional ethics.
WHY_AMIRAN.WhyAmiranFeatures1_Label: Supplying goods and materials at the right time and price
WHY_AMIRAN.WhyAmiranFeatures5_Label: Establishing and complying with HSE requirements
WHY_AMIRAN.WhyAmiranHSEDescription_Label: At Amiran, we firmly believe that Health, Safety, and Environmental protection are not just legal obligations—they are a fundamental part of our culture, our ethics, and our responsibility toward our people, our clients, and the environment we operate in. Our HSE policy is built around a proactive and preventive approach. From the very first stages of planning a project to the final phases of execution and delivery, safety is integrated into every process and decision. We continuously assess risks, implement global best practices, and update safety measures to ensure the well-being of every worker, visitor, and stakeholder on-site. We ensure that all personnel are properly trained, certified, and fully aware of the safety protocols specific to their role and working environment. Use of personal protective equipment (PPE), compliance with hazard warnings, and strict adherence to safety guidelines are mandatory and non-negotiable. In addition to occupational safety, we are deeply committed to environmental sustainability. We take deliberate steps to minimize environmental impact by reducing waste, managing energy consumption, recycling materials, and protecting local ecosystems throughout our operations. By embedding safety, health, and environmental values into the heart of our work, we strive not only to complete projects successfully—but to do so in a way that respects people, protects nature, and builds a better future for the next generations. We believe that every incident is preventable, every life is valuable, and every decision matters. Safety is not a slogan for us—it is our way of building.
WHY_AMIRAN.WhyAmiranReportsFeatureSection_Label: Weekly and monthly reports to the employer
WHY_AMIRAN.WhyAmiranFeatureDescription_Label: Providing the project's technical documentation booklet to the employer at the time of operation permit, approvedand executive drawings (end of work noncontradiction, construction drawings)
